entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's mind is in free fall, spinning out of control, unable to grasp the impossibility, because Fred Weasley could not be dead.

entities.name: fred weasley

relationships.description: Harry's mind is in free fall, spinning out of control, unable to grasp the impossibility, because Fred Weasley could not be dead.
Harry shouted 'Percy, come on, we've got to move!'
Ron had both grabbed Hermione and pulled her to the floor
Percy lay across Fred's body, shielding it from further harm
